Class CheckersModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkers.CheckersModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckersModel

    public class CheckersModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICheckersModel
    Model class for executing the game logic of checkers.

      • move

        public final void move(Move move)
        Executes the move being passed in the parameter. If multiple jumps are available sameTurn is set to true.
        Specified by:
        move in interface ICheckersModel
        Parameters:
        move - The move to be executed.

      • checkSameTurn

        public final boolean checkSameTurn(Move move)
        Checks to see if conditions are met for multiple jumps. It checks hypothetical jump conditions. Sets the current move to prevMove and waits for the users next selection.
        Parameters:
        move - The initial move being made.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not it is still the users turn.

      • validSameTurn

        public final boolean validSameTurn(Move move)
        Checks that if it is still the same users turn(i.e. a jump has been made) then the piece that made the initial jump must be the piece moved.
        Parameters:
        move - .
        Returns:
        .

        public final boolean isGameOver()
        Determines if the game status is over or not.
        Specified by:
